attributes.review: The amount of false information spread on this app is horrific not to mention the racist, xenophobic, and ignorant agenda it pushes. The man this app advocates for so loudly and intensely is one that only brings hate and ignorance wherever he opens his mouth. This app is disgusting and absolutely no one should be exposed to this.
attributes.title: Gross and frankly racist

attributes.title: Ughhhhh Worst app ever!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Trump has the audacity to have this as an app and thinks it’s okay to have this. TRILLIONS OF BUGS BY THE WAY, so it’s not safe for anyone’s personal information... I would give it 0 stars if it was possible 🤦🏾‍♀️ ! APP STORE PLEASE TAKE IT DOWN!!
